trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_SEQ_00<tab>Erenville would propose a course of action.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the cabin attendant.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat again.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>Right! Time to track down the next elector!
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_KRILE_000_005<tab>A heavenly land, suffused with a golden glow...
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>With only two keystones remaining, we've at last begun to gain a fuller picture of the legend of the golden city.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>What a turn of events─we were only meant to strengthen the ice, but Bakool Ja Ja's idiocy forced us to do them one better.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ZURMURWUR_000_016<tab>Long has it been since any from Chirwagur Saltern have deigned to enter Worlar's Echo. A day for unusual visitors, indeed.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_GURFURLUR_000_017<tab>Watching Vorporlor get caught up in Wuk Lamat's unstoppable wake reminds me of my younger days...

TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ERENVILLE_000_020<tab>I think it's time we returned to Tuliyollal. After scaling Tural's tallest mountain and battling a legendary beast to the death, even dauntless heroes like you could probably use a rest.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ERENVILLE_000_021<tab>In any case, there are preparations to be made before we can visit the next destination laid out in the saga.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ALPHINAUD_000_022<tab>The respite would be most welcome. I believe I hear the For'ard Cabins calling our names.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_030<tab>I'll take the opportunity to think on some things.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_KRILE_000_035<tab>No sooner did we set foot back in Tuliyollal than I felt the weight of recent events set in all at once. I am definitely due for a long nap.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ALPHINAUD_000_045<tab><yawn> I won't say no to clean sheets and a soft pillow.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ALISAIE_000_050<tab>There are still two feats left to go. We want to face them refreshed and ready for action.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_PESHEKWA_000_055<tab>Welcome back to Tuliyollal. Your cabins are waiting for you.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ERENVILLE_000_056<tab>Rest well, everyone. We can meet back here later on.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ERENVILLE_000_057<tab>I have a small errand to run in the city, so I'll leave you to recover.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ERENVILLE_000_058<tab>Will you be heading to the palace, Wuk Lamat?
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ERENVILLE_000_059<tab>...Wuk Lamat, did you hear me?
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ERENVILLE_000_060<tab>Lost in her own little world, it seems. Well, no matter─I'll be back soon enough.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_PESHEKWA_000_061<tab>An attendant is standing by to unlock your cabin. Enjoy your stay!
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>The best way I know...

TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_PESHEKWA_000_071<tab>The rite of succession must be an absolutely exhausting endeavor. The comforts of our cabins are at your disposal whenever you wish to retire, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.

TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_XBALAALEMPLOYEE04896_000_080<tab>Welcome back, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Your cabin is just as you left it─minus a light layer of dust!
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_090<tab>Sorry to drag you away from your nice, comfortable cabin, but I could feel the walls closing in.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_091<tab>Oh, I know! I'll take you to one of my favorite places in Tuliyollal─that should help me get my thoughts in order.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_092<tab>We'll go to the Resplendent Quarter and make our way up from there!
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_PESHIWA_000_100<tab>Oh, hello, dear. You're one of Wuk Lamat's new friends...?
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_105<tab>Peshiwa, what are you doing up and about? Is your back feeling better?
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_PESHIWA_000_106<tab>It's much healed now, so don't make a fuss. Besides, I can't be lounging in bed all day when you're out there fighting your hardest to win the throne.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_PESHIWA_000_107<tab>You're the claimant with the greatest love for peace.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_PESHIWA_000_108<tab>I love this nation of ours, and lending you my support is the least I can do.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_109<tab>When I see you smile like that, how can I not be encouraged?
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_PESHIWA_000_110<tab>Oh ho ho, there's plenty more who believe in your cause. I can recruit a whole battalion of smiling faces if you think it'll help!
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_111<tab>Yours alone is more than enough. Thank you, Peshiwa!
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_PESHIWA_000_112<tab>And thank you, Third Promise. I shall pray for your success in the contest.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_113<tab>All those smiling faces...
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_114<tab>...Ah, sorry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'm getting distracted.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_115<tab>It's just that with the progress we've made in the contest, even these everyday encounters feel that much more special.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_WUKLAMAT_000_116<tab>Do you think we can take our time, and maybe wander around a little first? Then we can head to that spot I was thinking of.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ALPHINAUD_000_130<tab>You look to be in good spirits. I assume your leisure time was well spent.
TEXT_KINGMB117_04896_ALPHINAUD_000_131<tab>I was glad to snatch some quality sleep, myself. After all, it will soon be back to the road for us!
